body:
Hello everyone



I am trying to generate grid-based daylight analysis and I have trouble setting my grid mesh on the floor. Please see the attached. I don't know why my analysis nodes are generated on a surface parallel to the wall rather than floor. And I don't know how to change the "DIR" to inside the box rather than outside. 



Thanks and I appreciate your help.



Ladan
topic: Setting The Grid for Daylight Analysis
